list.data: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><RelativeLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"    layout_width="match_parent"    layout_height="wrap_content"    background="#FFFFFFFF"    click="true"    function="frame" >    <TextView        id="@+id/weekly_index_item_date"        layout_width="match_parent"        layout_height="25dp"        date_format="MM/dd"        function="title_bar"        gravity="center_vertical"        paddingLeft="10dp"        textColor="#FF000000"        textSize="10dp"        visibility="gone" />    <View        id="@+id/weekly_index_item_date_line"        layout_width="fill_parent"        layout_height="2dp"        layout_below="@+id/weekly_index_item_date"        background="line"        function="titlebar_divider"        visibility="gone" />    <ImageView        id="@+id/weekly_index_item_img"        layout_width="fill_parent"        layout_height="width*0.53"        layout_below="@+id/weekly_index_item_date_line"        layout_marginLeft="10dp"        layout_marginRight="10dp"        layout_marginTop="10dp"        contentDescription="@null"        function="image"        scaleType="centerCrop" />    <TextView        id="@+id/weekly_index_item_title"        layout_width="wrap_content"        layout_height="wrap_content"        layout_below="@+id/weekly_index_item_img"        layout_marginLeft="10dp"        layout_marginRight="10dp"        layout_marginTop="10dp"        function="title"        textColor="#FF000000"        textSize="14dp"        title_default_color="#FFB83126"        title_readed_color="#FF000000" />    <RelativeLayout        id="@+id/weekly_index_item_desc_frame"        layout_width="fill_parent"        layout_height="wrap_content"        layout_below="@+id/weekly_index_item_title" >        <ImageView            id="@+id/weekly_index_item_row"            layout_width="wrap_content"            layout_height="wrap_content"            layout_alignParentRight="true"            layout_centerVertical="true"            layout_marginRight="15dp"            src="uri://index_item_arrow" />        <TextView            layout_width="wrap_content"            layout_height="wrap_content"            layout_alignParentLeft="true"            layout_marginLeft="10dp"            layout_marginRight="15dp"            layout_toLeftOf="@+id/weekly_index_item_row"            descCheckScroll="true"            function="desc"            paddingBottom="10dp"            paddingTop="10dp"            textColor="#ff9f9f9f"            textSize="12dp" />    </RelativeLayout>    <View        layout_width="fill_parent"        layout_height="2dp"        layout_below="@+id/weekly_index_item_desc_frame"        background="line" /></RelativeLayout>

head_item.data: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"    layout_width="match_parent"    layout_height="match_parent"    orientation="vertical" >    <LoadingImage        id="@+id/head_item_img"        layout_width="fill_parent"        layout_height="fill_parent"        click="true"        contentDescription="@null"        function="image"        scaleType="centerCrop" /></LinearLayout>

head.data: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><RelativeLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"    layout_width="match_parent"    layout_height="wrap_content" >    <IndexHeadCircularViewPager        id="@+id/weekly_index_gallery"        layout_width="fill_parent"        layout_height="width*0.5625"        function="head_view_pager"        tag="centerCrop" />    <TextView        id="@+id/weekly_index_gallery_title_text"        layout_width="fill_parent"        layout_height="wrap_content"        layout_alignBottom="@+id/weekly_index_gallery"        background="#BF000000"        ellipsize="end"        function="title"        gravity="center_vertical"        paddingBottom="10dp"        paddingLeft="8dp"        paddingRight="30dp"        paddingTop="10dp"        singleLine="true"        textColor="#FFFFFFFF"        textSize="12dp" />    <Button        id="@+id/head_default_line"        layout_width="fill_parent"        layout_height="2dp"        layout_below="@+id/weekly_index_gallery"        background="#ffdd3d14" />    <Button        id="@+id/head_right_line"        layout_width="fill_parent"        layout_height="2dp"        layout_below="@+id/weekly_index_gallery"        background="#FFFFFFFF"        function="head_anim" /></RelativeLayout>

cat_head.data: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><RelativeLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"    layout_width="wrap_content"    layout_height="wrap_content" >    <RelativeLayout        layout_width="wrap_content"        layout_height="40dp"        background="#191919"        function="content_frame"        select_bg="#323232"        unselect_bg="#191919" >        <ImageView            id="@+id/column_index_head_divider"            layout_width="1dp"            layout_height="fill_parent"            background="#414141"            contentDescription="@null"            function="cat_head_divider" />        <ImageView            id="@+id/column_index_head_icon"            layout_width="70dp"            layout_height="fill_parent"            layout_toRightOf="@+id/column_index_head_divider"            contentDescription="@null"            function="image"            scaleType="fitXY" />        <TextView            id="@+id/column_index_head_title"            layout_width="wrap_content"            layout_height="fill_parent"            layout_toRightOf="@+id/column_index_head_divider"            function="title"            gravity="center_vertical"            minWidth="70dp"            paddingLeft="30dp"            paddingRight="10dp"            textColor="#cccccc"            textSize="13dp" />        <ImageView            id="@+id/column_index_head_end_divider"            layout_width="1dp"            layout_height="fill_parent"            layout_toRightOf="@+id/column_index_head_title"            background="#414141"            contentDescription="@null"            function="cat_head_end_divider"            visibility="gone" />    </RelativeLayout>    <LinearLayout        layout_width="wrap_content"        layout_height="40dp"        function="add_subscribe"        orientation="horizontal" >        <ImageView            id="@+id/child_cat_head_add_subcribe_img"            layout_width="48dp"            layout_height="fill_parent"            contentDescription="@null"            scaleType="center"            src="uri://iweekly-subscribe-add.png" />    </LinearLayout></RelativeLayout>
